normalized: the adn are being killed in succession.
that damage will expand without stopping.
thus, 3 years ago i had thought it very likely i had put an end to to the ofa's actions.
that time….
it was the fault of my ineptitude, we can make the assumption that more victims, other adn members, will lose their lives…
thinking about the conversation i had with the eldest at the park, i struggled with it while walking and was late coming home.
becoming aware of myself, i breathed a light sigh.

name: asagi
normalized: as for my answer, i need one soon.
because the adn's time is ticking…
i muttered in a monologue for the sake of making sure of my own feelings.

name: asagi
normalized: i'm home
my younger sister, sakura, was in the living room.
in spite of me not coming home at the usual time.

name: asagi
normalized: sakura, today is still early, isn't it…what?
you're watching me with such a delightful face
speaking, sakura was staring at me with a broad grin.

name: sakura
normalized: welcome♪
because of my test from before, uh huh
still, sakura nodded with delight watching me.

name: asagi
normalized: ehh, test from before…but that's news to me.
for sure you did all right this time?

name: sakura
normalized: older sister.
don't you have any confidence in your cute younger sister?
although i felt she didn't study all the time, her older sister wanted sakura to properly spend time in college.

name: asagi
normalized: for this reason, cute younger sister.
proper study.
you just barely make a passing grade….
understand?

name: sakura
normalized: older sister, older brother sawaki has come♪
sakura spoke, sort of interupting my scolding.

name: asagi
normalized: （eh！？
kyousuke？

name: asagi
normalized: so, is he in the dojo？

name: asagi
normalized: （so, kyousuke is in the dojo）

name: sakura
normalized: yeah.
hehee♪
sakura watched me intently, smiling delightfully.

name: asagi
normalized: what?
watching with that smirk on your face

name: sakura
normalized: older sister's happy to meet with her lover, isn't she, but

name: asagi
normalized: you said but, what do you mean by that?
but what?

name: sakura
normalized: the adn - asagi, the evil spirits of rivers and mountains themselves tremble hearing her words, right♪
the adn - asagi is…
when sakura spoke of the adn, the words reminded me of the circumstances of what was said at the park.
i had better consider that, because i wasn't adn quite yet.

name: asagi
normalized: sakura!
ridiculing your sister, if you have so much leisure time, go study

name: sakura
normalized: oh dang！
run awaay
i tried to grip her just then, but sakura was able to nimbly avoid me.

name: asagi
normalized: ah!
wait

name: sakura
normalized: i'm off to a friend's house!
ah, i remember.
older sister, i too want to become adn

name: asagi
normalized: …eh！？

name: sakura
normalized: although older sister sort of opposes it, i too have ninja blood flowing inside me, i want to use it for the sake of all
sakura's eyes steadily fixed upon my eyes.

name: asagi
normalized: sakura…

name: sakura
normalized: so, as it is now, older sister will marry older brother kyousuke.
because i would be a fine successor to older sister afterwards!
well then, see you
winking lightly, sakura left the room.
did sakura recognize my problems?
my younger sister sakura was worrying about me.
as for me, sakura was worrying too much about it.
the qualities for sakura to become adn exist and the like, but that's a different story.
the adn = walking the ways of a female ninja, which means walking through scenes of carnage.
one is constantly exposed to danger, and at times, risking or even losing your life.
love making is considered taboo, so a woman's happiness is in shackles in the adn…
because such things would be a burden to sakura.

name: asagi
normalized: how should i respond?
there isn't always a straight answer to such things
sakura doesn't want to walk the same path i did…
even if she's more qualified than me.
even if she sacrifices everything for a mission, i don't want her to become something like adn.
sakura too is an ordinary woman in need of becoming happy.
but, we as sisters hold adn strength, the government wouldn't approve of ordinary women joining.
i wasn't able to unconditionally abandon kyousuke.
thus, pressing the matter of adn work on sakura….
such thoughts ran about inside my mind.
if sakura is intent on pursuing such, i won't oppose it.
although she had a light tone, that child's eyes when she spoke about it held sanctity.
regardless of how i think about her decision, the fact is she told me.
what too am i saying, sakura's decisions constantly vary.
i too once wanted to use the great strength dwelling in my blood for the sake of righteousness.
so, i feel she could become adn.

name: asagi
normalized: it's inexcusable to keep kyousuke waiting any more than this
presently, i'll go meet with kyousuke who's waiting at the dojo.

name: asagi
normalized: （supposing the ofa have been restored, i should inform him of the news.
me returning or not returning to the adn, i wasn't certain if it was my duty, or if it was wrong of me not to take it back up.
deciding in secret, i headed to the dojo where kyousuke resided.
continuing to the dojo, kyousuke sawaki was a childhood friend i fenced with in the dojo.
although a blood relative, the government agency turned him down and i was the only person who was to know of the adn.
he was the only man i trusted.
and best of all, who is more than an important person to me.
kyousuke became my childhood friend when he studied as a pupil of my father's at this fencing dojo until he died.
now, sweat covered his clothes, me and kyousuke in the olden days shed sweat like that polishing our fencing skills together.

name: kyousuke
normalized: yo, asagi
noticing my presence, kyousuke placed his fencing stick on the floor.

name: asagi
normalized: already your clothes are sweaty… why don't you change into an undergarment?
because you're lazy
kyousuke's clothes were sticky with sweat from me keeping him waiting.
in hot haste, i wiped kyousuke's head with a hankerchief.

name: kyousuke
normalized: it's fine.
because i can dry myself… besides, i'm rendezvousing with a person, since i have to leave immediately

name: asagi
normalized: if that's the case, that's all the more reason you can't go like that.
you have time for a shower

name: kyousuke
normalized: ah.
umm…asagi
kyousuke gazed into my eyes.
i knew what he wanted to say.
i shook my head at kyousuke's words.

name: asagi
normalized: that's ok.
as for the adn's conversation… kyousuke has nothing to worry about
the truth for the benefit of kyousuke, and for the sake of remaining together with him, i chose love over taboo.
but, i didn't want to present my feelings too much to kyousuke about that matter.
because that was my own personal decision.

name: kyousuke
normalized: ah…is that so, yeah, no kidding
kyousuke's response i sensed was a little clumsy.

name: asagi
normalized: um, who are you meeting with after this?
kyousuke stared into my eyes, smiling gently.

name: kyousuke
normalized: aah, just some things at home to do.
a sawaki family predecessor, i'm serving and looking after him
his family's ninja descendents have served the ikawa family for generations, inheriting the ninja blood.
his ancestors have supported the ninja, from child to grandchild….
however, the sawaki family blood and strength has faded.
and now not a single person inherits strength of the genes of the ninja in that family.

name: asagi
normalized: i see.
in that case, should i too come along?

name: kyousuke
normalized: it's fine.
it isn't that serious of a matter, besides, i have to leave immediately

name: asagi
normalized: i see…

name: kyousuke
normalized: that's right!
i'm eating dinner with you and sakura-chan.
so it seems i'm returning home until then…besides

name: asagi
normalized: besides…what？

name: kyousuke
normalized: yeah, that is, i wonder if i could speak with you then.
picking up his fencing stick from the floor, kyousuke handed it over to me.

name: asagi
normalized: …ah
while kyousuke passed over the fencing stick, he seized my hand affectionately.
and then, he stroked gently the ring finger of my left hand.

name: asagi
normalized: k, kyousuke?
what…
i stared at kyousuke in confusion.

name: kyousuke
normalized: yeah, at last, i seem to want to get if off my chest.
i still haven't offered my name among other such things…properly, have i
saying only that much and smiling at me, kyousuke departed.

name: asagi
normalized: kyousuke…
my feelings, possibly cliched, sort of rocketed to the sky at that moment.
at last, with kyousuke…
becoming the arranged time, kyousuke had yet to return home.
kyousuke wasn't answering his cellphone, and as a last resort, just the two of us ate dinner.

name: sakura
normalized: what's the matter?
older brother sawaki still hasn't come, has he

name: asagi
normalized: so it seems

name: asagi
normalized: （truly, what's the matter?
kyousuke）

name: sakura
normalized: i wonder if he's unfaithful?
i would be if it were older sister

name: asagi
normalized: come, apart from that, what about that test from before?
i scowled at sakura.

name: sakura
normalized: uu, that…yeaah
chasing sakura away to study, i began to prepare to go out.
changing into a female ninja, for the sake of kyousuke.
i wanted to settle this entirely the words kyousuke felt about me earlier today.
besides, it was necessary to check on the status of the ofa.
i wasn't adn, but a woman alone who desired happiness.
hearing kyousuke's affection conveyed to my heart, i felt that this wasn't him being tardy.

name: asagi
normalized: besides, intelligence is essential, isn't it
each piece of information the adn holds, amounts to accomplishing a mission.
of course, it isn't official, but i knew people who could provide me with details on shady influences.
unfortunately, intelligence wasn't always accurate.
shady people blended in everywhere.
this was the first time i had worn the ninja costume in several years.
the suit was familiar and fit neatly and sharply on my body and i hadn't neglected my training.
it was peaceful and cold throughout my entire body, my mood sort of permeated with a comfortable sensation.
hereupon, my six senses hinted upon a person being present.

name: asagi
normalized: sakura?

name: sakura
normalized: ehehe.
i've been exposed.
as one would expect of older sister
sakura appeared from a gloomy shadow.

name: asagi
normalized: now…sakura's ninja arts?
i was astonished.
sakura was above all, using ninja arts.

name: sakura
normalized: hehe…probably a considerable thing?
so, i said i too will come along

name: asagi
normalized: so that means if you can use ninja arts, you've been hiding your training from me, haven't you?
sakura had revealed earlier she wanted to become an adn member.
i wanted to hear it more accurately again.
and, i wanted to speak about her style.
as an older sister playing the role of a senior adn.

name: sakura
normalized: heh heh～♪
because you're always worried why i never had time to study, huh

name: asagi
normalized: again, you've never explained it to your older sister
she laughed as i flipped my finger lightly on sakura's forehead.

name: sakura
normalized: so what about, is older sister taking me along
i wasn't proceeding into battle, tonight was only intelligence gathering.
perhaps sakura now will study better.

name: asagi
normalized: understood, but you follow my every command.
got it?

name: sakura
normalized: whopee♪
roger, roger.
now, let's go, let's go

name: asagi
normalized: again, because it's okay
although i was a little shocked, i left with sakura in tow.
